name: DDN AI Complete Workflow - Phase 2 Final
description: Complete DDN Test Failure Analysis with Phase 2 features: 3-failure rule, manual triggers, feedback loop, PostgreSQL integration

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO failure_analysis (
  build_id, job_name, test_suite, error_category,
  root_cause, fix_recommendation, confidence_score,
  consecutive_failures, analysis_type, estimated_cost_usd,
  timestamp, feedback_requested
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.build_id }}',
  '{{ $json.job_name }}',
  '{{ $json.test_suite }}',
  '{{ $json.error_category }}',
  '{{ $json.root_cause }}',
  '{{ $json.fix_recommendation }}',
  {{ $json.confidence_score }},
  {{ $json.consecutive_failures || 1 }},
  '{{ $json.analysis_type }}',
  {{ $json.estimated_cost_usd }},
  NOW(),
  {{ $json.feedback_requested || false }}
)
RETURNING id;
